div.p: Eranyacloud is very committed to the performance and the reliability of our platform, that we offer not only a series of strong SLAs, but also financial penalties should we ever breach the SLA.
The SLA is related to the infrastructure availability (99.9%), its response time for service requests (15 minutes) and for DR offerings SLA for RTO&RPO.

Note that due to services being delivered over the public internet, the SLA for availability extends only to our border routers; issues with the delivery of internet packets upstream of our routers are excluded.

Penalty = jumlah SLA kredit yang akan diberikan
Resolution time = Total waktu perbaikan, dalam satuan jam
Service Price = Harga layanan yang terkena impact downtime
